entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Generators for different roslyn versions need different strong names #101750
  • Can't trace all GC allocations with ETW #101748
  • P99 Latency for .net 8 services increased > 10x #101746
  • Obsoletions with a DiagnosticId still get warnings in generated code #101738
    9.0.0
  • [Mono][Wasm][Interp] Assertion fail in Marshal.GetFunctionPointerForDelegate #101736
  • ILLink analyzer doesn't warn for unknown interpolated string #101733
    9.0.0
  • Test failure in System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.SingleGenericTensorPrimitives.SpanDestinationFunctions_SpecialValues #101731
    9.0.0
  • `System.IO.DirectoryInfo` misreports the `Extension` property for instances constructed with a trailing path (directory) separator #101730
  • .NET 9: Unhandled exceptions in background threads reported with empty managed frames #101729
  • NativeAOT + classlib + macOS host + linux-bionic-arm64 target: doesn't work out of the box / inscrutable errors #101727
  • System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.SingleGenericTensorPrimitives.SpanScalarDestination_SpecialValues fails #101721
  • dotnet restore fails when building repo #101720
  • Update `ConfigureHttpClientDefaults` to provide `IHttpClientBuilder` with the actual `Name` of an `HttpClient` #101719
  • Double check failing `allocPgoInstrumentationBySchema` EE calls #101711
    9.0.0
  • [9.0.100-preview.5.24227.1] IPInterfaceProperties.GatewayAddresses Property returns NULL #101710
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 20 Regressions on 4/28/2024 2:54:10 PM #101728
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 1 Regression on 4/22/2024 7:01:47 PM #101723
  • superpmi tool crashing with "Heap contamination detected!" #101708
    9.0.0
  • Why is `biarch` image used for Arm64 glibc and not Alpine? #101707
  • [API Proposal]: Add `FillAsync` and `FillSchemaAsync` to `DataAdapter` #101704

Closed

  • Assertion failed: (GetComponentSize() <= 2) || IsArray() #86273
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: readytorun/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism.cmd #101060
    9.0.0
  • [libraries-pgo] segfault in System.Linq.Tests #98292
    9.0.0
  • Dataflow analysis models result of `newobj` as MultiValueLattice.Top #101102
    9.0.0
  • May 9 21:11:41 server883 kernel: [218937.760135] .NET Server GC[1427719]: segfault at 8 ip 00007f7440ae835c sp 00007f74395bfdf0 error 6 #86183
    Future
  • Trim/AOT analyzer missing some ILC warnings #101203
    9.0.0
  • segv in JIT when ingesting dotnet/runtime into dotnet/aspnetcore #101695
    9.0.0
  • ConfigurationBinder source generator generates non-compilable code with new property changing enum types #101273
    9.0.0
  • AbbreviatedMonthGenitiveNames_Get_ReturnsExpected_HybridGlobalization failing with string mismatch #101634
    9.0.0
  • HttpClientHandler with PreAuthenticate enabled can't refresh expired password #93340
    9.0.0
  • superpmi replay/diff osx/arm64 failing #101685
    9.0.0
  • How to Apply XML Configuration for Removing Specific Attribute Instances in .NET Linker ( NativeAOT ) #101680
  • Assert failure: !"Heap contamination detected! HeapFree was called on a heap other than the one that memory was allocated from.\n" #55517
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • unblock Unix Domain Socket on Dispose on macOS #101753
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • Track unknown value as result of unimplemented operations #101752
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Fix CodeQL issue cpp/enum-index in mono #101751
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Remove Thread::m_pDomain - always the one app domain #101749
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix some TensorPrimitives tests failing for me locally with checked builds #101745
    needs-area-label
  • [Testing] Backport #92375 and #93082 to release/8.0-staging #101744
    new-api-needs-documentation, needs-area-label
  • Arm64/Sve: Add SignExtendWidening* and ZeroExtendWidening* math APIs #101743
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-arm64-sve
  • Exclude dependabot from community-contribution labeling #101742
    area-Meta
  • Use classes rather than records for parts of the incremental pipeline in interop generators and hide constructors #101740
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • JIT: synthesize PGO if no schema, when dynamic PGO is active #101739
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging]: Add cryptographic operation counts to prevent process crashes #101737
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security, 8.0.x
  • Run MethodOutParameterDataFlow tests in analyzer #101735
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [NO MERGE] generic wrapper methods for unsafe accessors #101732
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [WinHttpHandler] Move `_cachedSendPinnedBuffer` ownership to `WinHttpRequestState` #101725
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Update patch after template change #101712
    area-Build-mono
  • Update CentOS Stream version #101705
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [Testing] Backport #92901 to release/8.0-staging #101703
    area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [PERF] Temporarily use specific dotnet-version #101747
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0-staging] Prefer most derived member in Configuration Binder source generator #101686
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.x
  • Fix nonvolatile context restoration #101709
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Preserve static type info for return value of ctor #101212
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/9.0-preview4] JIT: Avoid relying on `bbNum` to find lexical loop boundaries #101724
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix #91958: use mach_timebase_info to determine process time coefficient on macOS #100122
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-mac-os-x, 8.0.x
  • JIT: Avoid relying on `bbNum` to find lexical loop boundaries #101714
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Backport #92296 to release/8.0-staging #101627
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Enable repackaging of NETStandard 2.1 Targeting Pack #101518
    Servicing-approved, area-Setup, 8.0.6
  • [release/8.0-staging] Revert "FileConfigurationProvider.Dispose should dispose FileProvider when it owns it" #101610
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-FileSystem
  • [LoongArch64] clear float type when passed by integer reg. #101713
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [S390x] Fix stack offset size while passing structure as argument. #101103
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, community-contribution
  • With system brotli, do not use versioned symbols #101576
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Backport assorted changes from runtimelab #101655
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Switch off `HybridGlobalization` lane on v8 on CI #101671
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Refresh cached credentials after PreAuthenticate fails #101053
    area-System.Net.Http
  • SPMI: Replay recorded allocPgoInstrumentationBySchema HRESULT #101696
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Extend mono_gsharedvt_constrained_call for static virtual calls #101491
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.x
  • [mono] Force Mono to respect explicit struct size when LayoutKind.Sequential is used #101529
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Update build instructions table #101706
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Arm64/Sve: Add SignExtend* and ZeroExtend* math APIs #101702
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-arm64-sve
  • Optimize flips between 1 and 0 #100491
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Remove distros versions calculation #100580
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution

Updated

  • Refactor some DateTime and TimeSpan formatting/parsing methods #101640
    area-System.Globalization, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Make normal statics simpler #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Seal overridden virtual method `SetDefaultFallbacks` #100030
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Remove perfinfo-%pid.map #101697
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add support for primary constructors in LoggerMessageGenerator #101660
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Merge JIT/Methodical tests into the merged runners #101317
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add `hostfxr_resolve_frameworks_for_runtime_config` for resolving runtime frameworks #101451
    area-Host, 9.0.0
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add AddAcross #101674
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Linker dependency framework #101277
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    area-Build-mono
  • Add more complete linux build instructions #101631
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][interp] Resolve virtual method on delegates created by compiled code #101290
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [NOREVIEW][NOMERGE] HTTP/3 stress data corruption hunt #101624
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • Enable derived COM interfaces to hide base methods with the new keyword #101577
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Clean up in LowerStoreIndirCoalescing #101665
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Code Versioning - move native code versioning state #101652
    area-VM-coreclr, Future
  • Remove unnecessary indirect use of managed wcslen from AppContext setup #101318
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Replace NETCOREAPP compiler directive with NET #101693
    area-Meta
  • add hooks to debug OpenSSL memory #101626
    area-System.Net.Security, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Use source built emsdk packages for the runtime build #100266
    area-Build-mono
  • Haiku: Add Haiku support for CoreCLR/PAL #93907
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • [release/8.0-staging] Revert "disable optimizations for PopCount (#99796)" #101245
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • JIT: Implement greedy RPO-based block layout #101473
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix unnecessary bounds check with ulong index #101352
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add option to change SVE vector length for current and children processes #101295
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • ARM64: Optimize Volatile.Read/Write for floats #101359
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix generic runtime lookup expansion in Tier0 #101153
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Test Only] async safe point interrupts after NOP change #101151
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove received bytes length check #100619
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • Disable OpenSSL internal SSL_SESSION cache for clients #101684
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [RISC-V] Add quirks for riscv to R2RDump #101683
    area-R2RDump-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Use ``BitOperations`` in couple more places #101701
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Simplify "secret stub arg" handling between JIT and EE #100823
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow async interruptions on safepoints #95565
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][wasm] Refactor mono_fixup_symbol_name #101681
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Fix 97272 #99818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 124.0.6367.91, windows: 124.0.6367.91 #101653
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Try to reduce cost of Async #101605
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • [browser] Fix ConvertDllsToWebCil stack dump on bad input to be error message with input path #101162
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Implement ARM32 atomic intrinsics #97792
    arch-arm32, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • optimize the store/restore for calleeSavedRegs. #101472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
